name: Darwin's Finches
description:
You play as Charles Darwin, on a mission to collect as many finches as possible to help develop his Theory of Evolution. 

There are four types of bird with distinct beaks and appearances, all of which feed on different foods on the island. You get a point for every bird collected, but get even more points for every 'set' of four birds you collect, so explore the whole island to ensure you catch plenty of each species.

Made for the Go Godot Jam 3. Had to submit early, so there are plenty of bits which could use improvement, but I am happy with the game overall.

Credits for Darwin's Finches:
